website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ XL2420G is a feature-rich 24-inch gaming monitor that uses Nvidia's G-Sync technology, and has a 144Hz refresh rate and a speedy pixel response to deliver an outstanding gaming experience.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this monitor, and couldn't be happier! You will need to calibrate this monitor to get the full visual experience and colour accuracy this monitor had to offer, and for your benefit here are my settings: Picture mode: standard (best colour accuracy) Blur: off Black eq: 0 Colour vibrance: 10 Low blue light: 0 Instant mode: off Auto game: off Brightness: 71 Contrast: 48 Sharpness: 5 Gamma: 4 Colour: normal AMA: off Dynamic contrast: off Hopefully these settings will work for you. This monitor is expensive, but these days you usually get what you pay for. I currently use it for my xbox one and my games have never looked sharper and more colour accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: I bought this during a Black Friday sale and what ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during a Black Friday sale and what a deal it was. I couldn't imagine how much of a differnce it makes gaming on a proper gaming monitor rather than a T.V. I'm slighly ahead of everyone becaue it processes the image quicker and there's no perceivable input lag which means when I move the mouse, or thumbstick when playing on the PS4, the movement happens immediately on screen; I feel more immersed because everything is so clear! If your into your gaming and your still playing on a T.V, your missing out.
customer_reviews.author: NoDangerBawbag

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Eye friendly monitor - have no problems after spending whole weekend playing and browsing with it. Very good ergonomics - you can easily adjust screen position in all 3 dimensions. Initial setup is tailored for FPS games. For normal usage select 'Standard' mode and gamma 5. Tom's Hardware has more calibration details.
customer_reviews.author: Volodymyr Korolyov

customer_reviews.text: what a lovely screen fantastic picture and nice looking ...very sturdy and well made...easy to put together ....would recommend to anyone who has trouble with small laptop screen ....buy one of these....I am a gamer and it really is fantastic just check your leads to your lappy as I didn't have a dvdi lead so had to wait till I could get one it is wonderful for watching movies too worth the extra money as quality is so much better than other screens out there .....so 10/10 from me
customer_reviews.author: zlorna

customer_reviews.title: Very good product !
customer_reviews.text: Even though the monitor arrived in bad condition (the package was opened and the box was opened everywhere), the monitor was in perfect condition ! The BenQ packaging is very nice ! This screen has so many ports available, it's AMAZING ! It has an headset stand on the left, very convenient ! You can plug your headphone + microphone on it too, and have many usb ports available. The colors need to be configured or you will have a awful colors. It is very easy to find some help online and advice to configure it. I love it, I would definately recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: SLEEK AND SIMPLISTIC
customer_reviews.text: I have truly enjoyed my time using this BenQ, and I would certainly recommend this this monitor to anyone in need of a new.it has been a pleasure reviewing this product. some customer may not wish to spend this much on a monitor. i can safely say that the price is worth it,the high grade and quality materials used in its construction really make it a luxurious monitor to use. the two micro USB ports really allow for productivity. it has been an absolute pleasure reviewing this product and i will enjoy my time using it in the future
customer_reviews.author: FerroReviews

customer_reviews.title: Become a pro gamer !!! Read !
customer_reviews.text: 3th day after I brought it and dead pixel !!! Absolutely incredible gameplay with this 144hz monitor! Massive difference between gaming on 60 and 144hz ! Since I brought this monitor I become 10x better in CSGO ! I managed to rank up from gold nova 4 to EL2 for less than a week! Every first shot is headshot I can't really believe how good I'm playing now ...give a try guys it's awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria B.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic monitor, picked it up on a sale and haven't regretted it once, upgraded from a 1080p 60Hz monitor, and the difference is night and day, its a very high quality product which is well built and provides loads of options and features. Expensive, but you get what you pay for, there is a reason these are used by professional gamers at tournaments.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Brackenridge Jones

customer_reviews.title: The monitor itself is great. The positives are 144hz (I play 120hz personally)
customer_reviews.text: The monitor itself is great. The positives are 144hz (I play 120hz personally), you can rotate the screen and even adjust the height of the monitor...and it has a cool little remote thing that you'll never use! The thing I dislike about it, the colours, over a year later and I still haven't found colour settings I'm happy with. If you're gaming on 60hz, I recommend a 144hz monitor 100%, it's life changing.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor overall
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor overall. The 1440p resolution is beautiful and the 144hz compliments it very well. The build is solid and is of a high quality. The only reason it isn't getting 5 stars is because the red accents on the monitor should have been LED instead of coloured plastic to give it a slightly more expensive feel. Freesync is also a plus feature which makes a huge difference when gaming at 144hz. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a mid to high end gaming monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It is a great monitor with excellent build quality and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I play a lot of CS:GO so wanted to see the difference a 144hz monitor would make to my playing experience. It is a great monitor with excellent build quality and looks great. As others have mentioned you will most likely want to tweak/adjust the default colour settings to get the best out of the picture, but this is easy enough to do with the software provided (or via the menus of the monitor).
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality but has a screen issue
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor however I have a light bleed from the monitor even when it's off, have to unplug it from the mains to have it completely turn off
customer_reviews.author: ozgur

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars EASILY
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Wanted to get another monitor and thought of upgrading from my LG 24inch 120Hz monitor to a 144Hz one. After doing some research, I came across this beauty and it has been wonderful. I have had this monitor for about a few months now and can't fault it at all. Smooth design and looks beautiful, along with doing everything it says on the tin. Would highly recommend, cannot even think of any downsides about this monitor
customer_reviews.author: MR AKIF HAQUE

customer_reviews.title: Works great for an all around use
customer_reviews.text: good monitor, great view angles, you have to calibrate it before using (check icc profiles on the internet) and then calibrate it within the panel menu (and if you want windows too). the blur reduction is great, but you have to have good fps (like csgo) otherwise it will destroy the fluidity of your gameplay. I love this monitor, it's good if you are at 40-50 cm of distance. definitely advising it, even if it's not a gsync one and only TN 1080p panel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Been using this monitor for over a month and it's been brilliant. It's very well built, comes with a brilliant stand. The picture quality is great colours seem true and nothing is out of balance. Having a monitor that is over 60hz really is something you need to experience. Playing games like call of duty as well as just browsing the Internet is a pleasure. Don't think I could back to gaming on a 60hz monitor anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Don Simon

customer_reviews.title: great upgrade for decent pricetag
customer_reviews.text: First proper gaming monitor after using a few TVs for 5 years. Got it for 30 or 33% off and was definately worth the money, great upgrade for decent pricetag. Have had it now for a month and really enjoying it in a gaming use. Rather heavy piece of kit that doesn't feel cheap, great quality. Chose this one over a cheaper one due to the height adjustement and haven't regretted, noticed improved posture after a week or so not having to look down all the time. All in all a well rounded gaming monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant monitor, but very bright.
customer_reviews.text: Loving the picture quality on this monitor. Very easy to set up and get going with and additional usbs are very handy. However, the BenQ monitors seem to have a reputation of being far too bright from the get go, putting a lot of emphasis on light colours. If you enjoy a bright monitor then there's no fault in this screen for you. However, if you prefer a darker screen you may need to do a little research to adjust your visuals before the screen feels comfortable. Tl;Dr : Monitor is good, but abnormally bright by default.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor I've owned worth the money 100% fantastic. I used to get trouble with my eyes getting bloodshot and really dry, but after using this screen for a few months those symptons have completely dissapeared. Also games are so much more fun to play at 144hz if you're computer can handle that fps. Even on some smaller indie games which is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W.

customer_reviews.title: 144hz monitor with various connections
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great. 144hz monitor with various connections (hdmi/display port etc) i bought this for my new nvidia gfx card. The image quality is nice and vibrant, it's quite lightweight and slim, it also has a small retractable hook on the side you can hang headphones on. I'll be getting a 2nd soon...
customer_reviews.author: Symon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Budget Gaming Screen
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic monitor, the height and angle adjustments are excellent, much better than an older BenQ screen that my son uses, which only has height adjustments, the only problem I have is the lack of audio, it would be great if BenQ could offer a screen that offers all this PLUS speakers. On the whole though, I would totally recommend this to a friend who was looking for a budget gaming screen.
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda's Twin

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor - Look no further
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for the best monitor and this is as close as I think you can get. I opted for this until . Monitors are down to personal preference but I moved from an IPS to this and would now only go back when a a high refresh rate IPS, at a decent price bracket, comes around. I recommend this monitor due to its excellent build quality and features, one of my favourites is the headphone headrest - a little addition that is really handy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. J. G. Dow

customer_reviews.title: screen ideal for gaming
customer_reviews.text: my son bought this screen and two years later still uses it. It is exactly right if you are a gaming fanatic! High resolution, fast screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Annemarie Schellens

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, great monitor. I would never buy a monitor without preset picture modes and the BenQ has three to choose from. Happy with the colour balance and nice and sharp. Black Equaliser mode is fantastic for first person shooters, enabling you to see those craft campers in the shadows.
customer_reviews.author: Mr W

customer_reviews.title: Words cannot express my happiness.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believed my eyes when I saw the monitor installed. It is just too beautiful. It's awesome! I was planning to buy a cheap monitor as a second monitor for my laptop. Eventually I decided that I deserve something better, that I deserve the BEST ! It's perfect for games, it's perfect for anything you'll need.
customer_reviews.author: FlouGOD

customer_reviews.title: An excellent monitor for desktop gaming with superb colours
customer_reviews.text: An excellent monitor for desktop gaming with superb colours. The variety of inputs are fantastic as are the added usb sockets. The rebranded version cost considerable more giving the buyer not a lot for the extra outlay. A contender to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: MechaGamera

customer_reviews.title: Very GOOD
customer_reviews.text: If you are Thinking About Getting This Or The XL24LLZ (AS I HAVE THE XL24LLZ AND THIS) Then get THIS, Colours a LOT better ONCE Optimised... 100% Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JoshRadford

customer_reviews.title: Leaking oil from the support.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is fine, but the support is leaking oil, slowly, but it leaks a lot of oil. I contacted BenQ and was told not to worry, because it is normal. I don't think that this is acceptable, so keep in mind that it might leak, if you're considering buying this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor being able to fully rotate the monitor to ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor being able to fully rotate the monitor to fit more easily into multi monitor set ups is a dream. The colour on the monitor is superb and makes a huge difference when playing PC games but even makes console games look great! must buy!
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: 144hz value
customer_reviews.text: Good value 144hz monitor. If you have a smaller desk might be worth while investing in an arm as the stand this comes with is very large. Overall very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for a competitive/ranked player
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor, the Black Equaliser helps me so much in CS:GO, then I can simply switch settings for more colour vibrancy when I play LoL. The 144Hz makes everything so much smoother as well; very good monitor. Never thought I would see a use for the circular remote, but switching display settings with button is so nice. Nothing bad to say about this monitor, especially for the price, it has everything you need to give you a good competitive/ranked match.
customer_reviews.author: Kamran

customer_reviews.title: The monitor has pretty awesome build quality
customer_reviews.text: The monitor has pretty awesome build quality. It came very well packaged although smaller and lighter then I thought. It was exactly what I wanted and picked. The remote to change and memorize settings its pretty useful if you are a hardcore gamer. I haven't gone through all the menu options...they are so many!
customer_reviews.author: Aderitus

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Impossible to calibrate the colours on this monitor. Which at £300 is unbelievable. Only just tried to use at as been to uni - but so far a waste of space :-(
customer_reviews.author: Gamester

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my last 2 years of gaming
customer_reviews.text: INSANE! the difference on FPS is almost unexplainable. If you play csgo, or any other fps for that matter and your on 60hz, MAN UP AND PUT UR HANDS IN YOUR POCKET. Cant believe up until two weeks ago, i had no idea there even was a 144hz. Wasted my last 2 years of gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Best for Gamers
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best purchase I have ever made , the monitor itself is just so smooth , the 144hz is amazing and I could tell the difference as soon as I plugged it in , the gaming mode is really well made and the monitor colouring is amazing , its last me for 5 months and counting with NO issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good monitor but a lot of the features are gimmicky ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good monitor but a lot of the features are gimmicky such as the blur reduction module on this particular model doesn't really work well but overall the monitor is fine and good for FPS games like CSGO.
customer_reviews.author: Kazuki

customer_reviews.title: A must for PC gamers!
customer_reviews.text: I know it's must but just splash it! 144hz is incredible, you won't be disappointed, you won't go back either
customer_reviews.author: Benji

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic monitor! Had a fews problems trying to get it work originally but is a really good monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Longmore

customer_reviews.title: the extra detail I now get just makes them seem like completely new games.
customer_reviews.text: Don't worry if you haven't heard the name before, it's a quality item. Didn't need any setting up with windows 7, just plugged it in and it was immediately in the appropriate resolution. This is my first proper HD monitor and I just wish I'd got one years ago - it's awesome! I'm currently playing Civilisation V and COD Ghosts and the extra detail I now get just makes them seem like completely new games.
customer_reviews.author: Stek23

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gaming and films
customer_reviews.text: The best monitor I've ever had, coming from a low refresh rate much older BenQ the difference is huge. The build quality and design is great, it allows for a high level of customisation with position, height and angles to suit everyones desk and set up. The quality, colours, and lighting, are miles better than any other monitor I have used in the past (after a bit of customisation in the settings)
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant screen and bonus points for the audio out. :)
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this one. works wonders for both gaming and watching movies. - also the audio out is a brilliant bonus. It means i just have a firestick attached to a hdmi in, and the audio out of the headphones out, into my speakers. So no need to turn on the computer if just watching a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Kristoffer L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is amazing. A few tweaks once setting up but apart from that it's great. You get a little button for the monitor which you can predict set for different games. So instead of changing the settings for games you play, you can just press button 1 2 or 3 with your previous loaded screen settings or just press auto which trust it's best to get the right balance.
customer_reviews.author: James Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Stylish with good image refresh rate.
customer_reviews.text: My son specified this particular make and model for PC gaming and he is very happy with it. Looks stylish and has a good image refresh rate which is important for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dalby

customer_reviews.title: 35-144hz Freesync
customer_reviews.text: No nonsense bezel and stand, panel provides good color. 35-144hz Freesync has alot of other "gaming" features but i set and forget.. Its a good panel buy one!
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this monitor looks great and is very easy to setup, the stand just clips together, the stand is quite heavy but it needs to be cause you can tilt and position it how you please, next just follow the steps and download display pilot and you're good to go, got the item very quick if you want to upgrade or buying your first gaming monitor I highly recommend this it looks great and performs very good I know I'm gonna be buying atleast 1 more 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Dean bailey

customer_reviews.title: No PWM
customer_reviews.text: Better than the Asus equivalent, 144hz is the business for gaming, well worth the money, this will last decades, and it doesnt use pulse width modulation for brightness control so no more flickering and headaches ;)
customer_reviews.author: Conal S.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, once you fix the colour issue! Fantastic for games just needs a little setup and away you go! Worth every penny for moba and fps gamers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: However the colours seemed to be washed out compared to any IPS/PLS type panel and for movies it isn't as great. For gaming howe
customer_reviews.text: 144hz is gorgeous, smooth and glidey. However the colours seemed to be washed out compared to any IPS/PLS type panel and for movies it isn't as great. For gaming however, you'll notice a significant difference if you can handle framerates of 144 and above, otherwise it will be wasted as your computer cannot output above 144.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Tsoi

customer_reviews.title: An excellent monitor, for anyone curious about upgrading from 60Hz ...
customer_reviews.text: An excellent monitor, for anyone curious about upgrading from 60Hz to 144Hz it's absolutely worth it and instantly noticeable just by moving the mouse across the desktop. The build quality of the monitor is great and the stand while a bit heavy is incredibly sturdy while allowing the screen to be easily adjusted. Changing the height and the rotation of the screen is very simple and extremely helpful, I highly recommend this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: James B

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken and chipped not like description had to return
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb clarity and colour balance.
customer_reviews.text: Oozes quality from the moment you open the box and see the care with which its packed. I was already using a Samsung 1080p monitor but the colours and picture clarity that I get with the Benq put the old monitor in the shade. Very easy to select ideal modes for any situation and fast response times are great for games like Destiny. Don't know why I didn't buy one of these long ago.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Baines

customer_reviews.title: Perfect comp gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: I play csgo and some other games and this really helps with its high refresh rate and freesync. Only problem is once you've seen 144Hz anything below 50FPS looks really choppy. XD
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awsome monitor looks the business and performs amazing would recommend
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: CS:GO OP
customer_reviews.text: I love it! This monitor is brilliant for gaming, I personally use it for CS:GO and went from Master Guardian II to Legendary Eagle and I have no plan at stopping! GG
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Jamieson

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Such a good looking monitor, with a really great picture and lots of useful features. I'm surprised that I paid out more than £250 on a monitor but I can't really say that I regret it.
customer_reviews.author: David Turner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: superb 144 fps monitor with superb gaming options,expensive but well worth it
customer_reviews.author: JD Geary

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I love it, Exactly what I wanted from my monitor the 144Hz is as expected and the settings for the the monitor are very good. Very stable on my desk and lots of options for customising the height and angle of the screen All in all very good but also fairly pricey for a monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous
customer_reviews.text: This is a great monitor and worth every pound it cost. It syncs seamlessly with the AMD graphics card inside the PC I own and I have not had any technical issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. J. Budahazi

customer_reviews.title: 60hz monitor? GET THIS!
customer_reviews.text: At first the 60hz to 144hz display changed my life, and now I am sad to say that I can't notice it as much :( Good monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Booty

customer_reviews.title: so much better than my old one which I thought was good ...
customer_reviews.text: Lovely monitor, so much better than my old one which I thought was good at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: colours are gorgeous out of the box, especially for a tn panel and 144hz is gaming glory.
customer_reviews.author: Sam B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase that has reduced eye strain and made the ...
customer_reviews.text: High Resolution, fast refresh rate and a decent size. Excellent purchase that has reduced eye strain and made the PC a lot more enjoyable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Monitor, good out the box setup and amazing ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Monitor, good out the box setup and amazing colours once you tweak them to your liking, sturdy and well built, will take more or less anything you throw at it, highly recommended, friend came round, saw it, purchased one for himself there and then.
customer_reviews.author: George Durrant

customer_reviews.title: FPS: look no further
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for gamers, I bought second hand because it was another £40 off for 'damaged packaging' which was actually perfect but would happily pay full price, big difference and improvement if you've never played on a monitor before. Buy this, you won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the higher prices of the BENQ monitors however IT is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sooraj

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful clear image
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful clear image. Lots of functionality to be played with if you want to have your image how you like it!
customer_reviews.author: Robtay

customer_reviews.title: Good quality overall
customer_reviews.text: Good quality overall.. Color quality needs major customization at first...Really noticed the difference the first time I moved my mouse..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It has a great quality picture and ideal size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 15 year old son for his gaming pc. Read a few reviews of different types of monitors and this was stood out. It has a great quality picture and ideal size.
customer_reviews.author: Teriesa

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this monitor for my son . For gaming . The graphics are amazing ,& he says the refresh rate is great to . Delivered fast aswll .
customer_reviews.author: Paul gordon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love my new monitor easy to put together thank you amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it but wish the price was lower to buy 2 more
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Duerden

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor I have ever used, been used for around 2 years now and not a single complain, fantastic product, looks amazing, solid build quality, great screen quality. VERY happy
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for playing Counter Strike on. 144hz makes a real difference
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor ive ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best monitor ive ever used! never played on 140hz before but if u play competitive or even casual gaming, u need this :) 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitor. Perfect and great delivery from Amazon warehouse
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic monitor. Perfect and great delivery from Amazon warehouse. Glad I spent the extra cash rather than spending less and being unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Barney Haydon

customer_reviews.title: Great 144hz monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great 144hz monitor, I'd definitely recommend it for anyone looking for a silky smooth gaming experience. It takes a while to get the colours set up. Things are a little saturated and there is blur around some objects in game. It took me a little while to get settings that I was happy with, but all is well now. Once set to 144hz and the colours are sorted, it's really easy on the eyes. I'd recommend using the monitor itself to configure the settings, as their "Display Pilot" is rather slow and frustrating. Overall, it's a fantastic monitor, but it will require patience to find the settings that suit you best.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed XL2430T
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Build Quality, smoothness at 144Hz Cons: Picture quality, serious shift in brightness as you move your head up and down in normal usage. Blacks are washed out particularly towards the bottom of the screen. Sat next to my £120 3 year old IPS monitor it looks shocking. I know of the TN vs IPS pros / cons but reading reviews led me to believe that this screen wasn't that far off. Will persevere with trying more settings but looking like I'm going to be returning this. Wish there was a 1080p 144Hz IPS screen but guess I'll have to save up for a 1440p one and a new GPU to power it.
customer_reviews.author: Whippet

customer_reviews.title: so far so good! As promised about the specs I received from ...
customer_reviews.text: First product I've ever bought from BenQ, so far so good! As promised about the specs I received from this monitor. High 1ms GTG is what I was looking for, along with great refresh rates. This monitor has the best built ever, super solid, stand are so stable and doesn't even move a little when I shake the my table. Frame on the corner is quite thin. However I needed to spent some times calibrate the right colour for my desire. But it's great after all, I got what I needed. Price might be quite high but it's worth it! 5/5!
customer_reviews.author: PizzaBoy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing monitor for the price. Very crisp images, plenty of customization for the picture settings and that lovely 144hz that you crave. Perfect for those who have no interest in the whole 3d image gimmick! Also boasts a VERY fast input delay (and no I'm not talking about the response rate). The time it takes for the image to be sent from the graphics card to actually being displayed is one of the lowest available on the consumer market in this price bracket. Funny that alot of manufacturers (including BenQ) don't include this specification on their products and consumers have had to invent devices purely to test this. Eitherway a cracking purchase at this price range!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Hatch

customer_reviews.title: My new display
customer_reviews.text: Great display overall I'm pleased with my purchase. Easy to set up, really good user experience, super fast refresh rate and good build quality. First one I ordered had a dead pixel but amazons amazing customer service swapped it straight out for me. Mine is in my bedroom I have my Xbox plugged works really well
customer_reviews.author: TROB

customer_reviews.title: Best 2560x1440 blur reduction monitor on the market, if you have the power to drive it
customer_reviews.text: I moved to this monitor from an Asus PG278Q. They use the same panel so the image quality and color reproduction is very similar. I use Nvidia so the main difference for me is the loss of GSYNC but gaining a MUCH brighter blur reduction mode. Nice to haves like black equalizer dont hurt either. Whats even better is the street price for this monitor is less than the Asus so i actually made money in the swap. If i had to complain about one thing its the ugly thick bezel on the Benq compared to the Asus but it isn't really important to me. Great monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Sam M.

customer_reviews.title: ONLY good for gaming
customer_reviews.text: It's an amazing monitor for gaming, it's true that you can tell the difference between 144Hz and 60Hz. Today was the first time I tried 144Hz. However, this monitor is pretty bad for anything else, YouTube videos look bad, and in general the colours are not good.
customer_reviews.author: Faris

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic 144hz Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Always a pleasure to use BenQ products well worth the money, was very easy to set up straight out of the box, colours are perfect, 1ms and 144hz is such a plus. Could not recommend this any more.
customer_reviews.author: A. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This monitors bad boy 144hrz is so smooth,colours are good,personally I Dnt think you need a bigger screen
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: It flickers randomly sometimes. Plus you can still notice an element of ghosting even with their technology enabled. It's not a bad monitor don't get me wrong. It's just not worth the price tag..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good after calibration
customer_reviews.text: Really well built monitors, but they can be improved so much with a bit of effort. I'd never put much time into calibrating monitors before, but since I bought two of these I really wanted them to match perfectly and look as good as they could. Took a while but was definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: ... gaming for 4 years now and this is the best investment I have made yet it is so much ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been into PC gaming for 4 years now and this is the best investment I have made yet it is so much move visually pleasing than a 60Hz monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Loving the monitor - primarily used for CS:GO however just using the desktop is extremely more satisfying. It's one of those things you don't really notice when moving up in refresh rate, however when you move back down to 60Hz, you finally notice how choppy it is.
customer_reviews.author: Wiktor Jurek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale yesterday, a true bargain at £209.99. Very easy to manage using the S switch. Make sure to update your graphics drivers or the picture won't scale properly and the resolution will be wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Vasily

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with a s-switch,
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with a s-switch, after waiting 4 days for the one day delivery i cba to have it returned
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Penney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing monitor. does exactly what it says on the tin... heavy gamer highly recommended for
customer_reviews.author: alex cornell

customer_reviews.title: Best monitor for CS:GO
customer_reviews.text: Playing CS:GO on this 144hz monitor is absolutely insane! Epic monitor! I highly recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Petar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, just checked it for few hours so far ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, just checked it for few hours so far but its a really nice improvement for fps gamer like me - 144hz is great ;)
customer_reviews.author: Adam Wujcik

customer_reviews.title: really nice. Responsive and a huge upgrade from a 2011 ...
customer_reviews.text: Really... really nice. Responsive and a huge upgrade from a 2011 75hz Asus monitor :) I make quick 180 turns in Overwatch without any blur now!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It's great but it didn't get me to Global Elite so ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great but it didn't get me to Global Elite so I feel I wasted my money... oh well, my fault not the product's.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Fraser

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a monitor, I was worried the TN panel wouldn't be clear enough for me to do my course work on as well as play Xbox one games, boy was I wrong, I hooked this up as second screen for my iMac through the Thunderbold outlet and quite honestly it's blown the socks off the picture quality of my iMac brought in 2013. Xbox One games have never looked so crisp, the little remote is awesome to navigate trough the menus as well, Honestly speaking if you have the money just buy it, it's crazy good! Bad points: Are you joking!
customer_reviews.author: BourneVengeance

customer_reviews.title: just the small jump from 120Hz to 144 Hz is noticeable and with the higher resolution I have fallen in love with BF4 again
customer_reviews.text: Massive improvement over my BenQ 2420T....just the small jump from 120Hz to 144 Hz is noticeable and with the higher resolution I have fallen in love with BF4 again......plus I now have proper physical buttons on the monitor which makes adjusting settings a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: I would expect a gaming monitor to be excellent but this one ups the bar for the rest ...
customer_reviews.text: I would expect a gaming monitor to be excellent but this one ups the bar for the rest of them. The picture quality is great, colour reproduction needs tweaking but after this it gives pro photo monitors a run for their money. As for gaming, after you experience 144hz with blur reduction you don't want to go back to 60hz counter-strike.
customer_reviews.author: Poiote Ruambar

customer_reviews.title: It lasted 6 months then died
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this for just over 6 months and was very happy with it until it packed up while our gaming mad teenager was in the middle of a game, hoped it was the fuse that had gone in the plug, but no the monitor is now dead as the proverbial Dodo.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor J. Kinrade

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor around a year ago. It now has an issue in that it won't power off. I have attempted to return to BenQ for repairs but they require a proof of purchase that Amazon will not provide to me. So be wary of purchasing this from Amazon if you want to be prepared for when repairs may be needed.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We returned this monitor after fruitlessly having tried for about 3 hours straight to get any decent picture out of it. It seems with all the settings you can either get nice looking blacks, or decent looking colours, but not both. This is not the first time we have calibrated a monitor, my wife knows what she's doing, but this monitor just proved a disaster. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: I. Saunders
